overview: Cassidy, having recently lost her mom and breaking up with her boyfriend, decides to visit her Dad, thinking that he may need some consoling while he's grieving. She's surprised to discover his state of mind is nothing she imaged. She discovers that an overly sexy French maid seems to be living there. But the Dad insists she's not his girlfriend, nor his maid. In fact, he hardly seems to notice she's even there. So what's she doing there? Intrigued, she asks the maid questions and learns its an S&M lifestyle choice. The "maid" introduces her to a kinky sex club, and she quickly discovers a hidden passion.
title: Shades of Kink 7
